scripts.diff:Wave2:Pipe: npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/cdk-express-pipeline.ts deploy 'Wave2_*' --  --profile systanics-role-exported --exclusively --require-approval never --concurrency 10
scripts.diff:Wave2:PipeAssembly: npx ts-node --prefer-ts-exts bin/cdk-express-pipeline.ts deploy 'Wave2_*' -- --app cdk.out  --profile systanics-role-exported --exclusively --concurrency 10
